data.name: Sexcraft - Adult Art Pack
data.detailed_description:
Wanna Sexcraft H-scenes and Sexual Animations in your pocket?


This pack contains Sexcraft H-scenes and all Sexual Animations available in the game as Gif Files. In other words, you'll get:

  • H-scenes in pixel art style;
  • Gif Files with all Sexual Animations!

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Sexcraft - Sofiya and the Lewd Clan\Adult Art Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong language and is about sexual themes.
